org.cougaar.core.service
Interface BlackboardMetricsService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface BlackboardMetricsService
extends Service

This service provides primitive blackboard metrics.

Also see the BlackboardQueryService.

Method Summary
 int getBlackboardCount()
          Get a count of the total number of objects currently found in the Blackboard.
 int getBlackboardCount(java.lang.Class cl)
          Get a count of all instances of the given type currently found in the Blackboard.
 int getBlackboardCount(UnaryPredicate predicate)
          Get a count of objects currently in the Blackboard that match the given predicate.
 

Method Detail

getBlackboardCount

int getBlackboardCount()
Get a count of the total number of objects currently found in the Blackboard.

Equivalent to "getBlackboardCount(Object.class)".

getBlackboardCount

int getBlackboardCount(java.lang.Class cl)
Get a count of all instances of the given type currently found in the Blackboard.

This is more efficient than the equivalent predicate-based approach.

getBlackboardCount

int getBlackboardCount(UnaryPredicate predicate)
Get a count of objects currently in the Blackboard that match the given predicate.
